titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the David H. Scott Collection of Eddy Duchin Recordings, 1932-1949
Scott (David H.) Collection of Eddy Duchin Recordings
titlestmt.author: Processed by D. Claudia Thompson

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by D. Claudia Thompson February 2016

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: David H. Scott collection of Eddy Duchin recordings

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

did.abstract: Recordings of American dance orchestra leader Eddy Duchin collected by David H. Scott.

bioghist.head: Biography of David H. Scott
bioghist.p: David H. Scott began collecting recordings of Eddy Duchin’s music and radio shows in 1933. He completed the collection in 1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains phonograph recordings of Eddy Duchin and his orchestra issued by Columbia, Brunswick, Victor, and Harmony. In addition there are radio broadcasts from 1935 to 1949, including U.S. Navy programs and the short-lived “Eddy Duchin Show.” Also included are recordings of Eddy Duchin’s solo piano performances. The collection also contains audio tapes made from the disc recordings.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are no known other archival collections created by David H. Scott at the date of processing.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was received from David H. Scott between 1973 and 1985.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection was processed by D. Claudia Thompson in February 2016.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Folder Number, Collection Name, Collection Number, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.
